snippet: David Hyde Pierce explains the production of “The Importance of Being Earnest” that he is directing for this summer’s Williamstown Theater Festival.
abstract: David Hyde Pierce explains the production of “The Importance of Being Earnest” that he is directing for this summer’s Williamstown Theater Festival.

headline.main: Running Wilde: A Gangster Version of 'Earnest,' Directed by David Hyde Pierce
headline.print_headline: Wilde With a Tommy Gun At Williamstown Festival
